verses.verse: Then he showed <WH7200> me Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel <WH4397> of the Lord, <WH3068> and Satan <WH7854> standing <WH5975> at his right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> to accuse <WH7853> him.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Satan, <WH7854> "The Lord <WH3068> rebuke <WH1605> you, Satan! <WH7854> Indeed, the Lord <WH3068> who has chosen <WH977> Jerusalem <WH3389> rebuke <WH1605> you! Is this <WH2088> not a brand <WH181> plucked <WH5337> from the fire <WH784>?"
Now Joshua <WH3091> was clothed <WH3847> with filthy <WH6674> garments <WH899> and standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel. <WH4397>

And he spoke <WH6030> and said <WH559> to those who were standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> him saying, <WH559> "Remove <WH5493> the filthy <WH6674> garments <WH899> from him." Again he said <WH559> to him, "See, <WH7200> I have taken <WH5674> your iniquity <WH5771> away <WH5674> from you and will clothe <WH3847> you with festal <WH4254> robes. <WH4254>"

Then I said, <WH559> "Let them put <WH7760> a clean <WH2889> turban <WH6797> on his head. <WH7218>" So they put <WH7760> a clean <WH2889> turban <WH6797> on his head <WH7218> and clothed <WH3847> him with garments, <WH899> while the angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068> was standing <WH5975> by.
And the angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068> admonished <WH5749> Joshua <WH3091> saying, <WH559>

"Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> 'If <WH518> you will walk <WH1980> in My ways, <WH1870> and if <WH518> you will perform <WH8104> My service, <WH4931> then you will also <WH1571> govern <WH1777> My house <WH1004> and also <WH1571> have <WH8104> charge <WH8104> of My courts, <WH2691> and I will grant <WH5414> you free <WH4109> access <WH1980> among <WH996> these <WH428> who are standing <WH5975> [here.]

'Now <WH4994> listen, <WH8085> Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> you and your friends <WH7453> who are sitting <WH3427> in front <WH6440> of you â€“ indeed <WH3588> they are men <WH376> who are a symbol, <WH4159> for behold, <WH2009> I am going to bring <WH935> in My servant <WH5650> the Branch. <WH6780>

'For behold, <WH2009> the stone <WH68> that I have set <WH5414> before <WH6440> Joshua; <WH3091> on one <WH259> stone <WH68> are seven <WH7651> eyes. <WH5869> Behold, <WH2009> I will engrave <WH9466> an inscription <WH6603> on it,' declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> 'and I will remove <WH4185> the iniquity <WH5771> of that land <WH776> in one <WH259> day. <WH3117>

'In that day, <WH3117>' declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> 'every <WH376> one <WH376> of you will invite <WH7121> his neighbor <WH7453> to [sit] under <WH8478> [his] vine <WH1612> and under <WH8478> [his] fig <WH8384> tree. <WH8384>' "
